idCitation.resTitle: NATO Vector Graphic to Feature Class

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This tool converts NATO Vector Graphic (NVG) overlays created in iGeoSit and converts them to geodatabase feature classes. The tool supports NVG versions 0.3, 1.4.0 and 1.5.0. No other versions are supported at present. The tool was written against sample data only as there was no access to iGeoSit at the time. As a result features may be missed. Please check your results to confirm all features have been created. The tool will only extract the geometry and labels for features. style information can be extracted if required. Please contact the GASC for additional features.

The tool does not handle raster data in NVG. The tool willextract points, polylines, polygons and circles.

tool.name: NVG2FC
tool.displayname: NATO Vector Graphic to Feature Class

param.name: nvgFile
param.dialogReference: The version 0.3, 1.4.0 or 1.5.0 NVG file to export to feature class.

param.name: outWksp
param.dialogReference:
The output file geodatabase to store the results in. Depending on what is found in the NVG file upto 3 feature classes will be created. They are:

  • Point_<nvg file name>

  • Polyline_<nvg file name>

  • Polygon_<nvg file name>

If these features exist the tool will attempt to overwrite them. If this fails the tool will fail.
